column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Not bad.  I got the personal sized pizza.  It wasn't too big.  Fairly tasty.  It took 40 minutes
column2: which might be understandable for a huge deep dish
column3: but I felt like this was a bit on the small side to take so long.  If you're into deep dish
column4: everyone raves this is the best pizza in Chicago.
